task.summary: Add custom property binding and event binding to message content
Refactor AppComponent into messageListComponent and messageInputComponent

Define Message service to add, get, delete messages
Add message service in message-input component to store new messages
Use messageService to show messages in messageList component
Use edit message and delete message methods of MessageService
Add ngForm directive to messageInput Component and define related methods

Feat: Add angular2 router definitions for messages and auth page
Feat: Add router location strategy, HashLocationStartegy
Feat: Add user logout component definition
